name: 謝忠健
objective:
布林代數與邏輯閘，組合邏輯，算術演算邏輯，同步循序邏
輯，演繹狀態機，非同步循序邏輯。
schedule:
1. Digital Systems and Binary Numbers
2. Boolean Algebra and Logic Gates
3. Gate Level Minimization
4. Combinational Logic
5. Synchronous Sequential Logic
6. Registers and Counters
7. Memory and Programmable Logic
8. Asynchronous Sequential Logic
scorePolicy:
平時成績: 40 % 含作業與小考
期中考  : 30 %
期末考  : 30 %
materials:
TextBook:
  Digital Design, 4th Edition, M. Mano & M. Ciletti, Prenhall 2007
Reference:
  Fundamentals of Digital Logic with Verilog Design, S.Brown, McGraw
